edu.cnm.deepdive.personalizedsafariapp.view

Class AccommodationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<edu.cnm.deepdive.personalizedsafariapp.view.AccommodationAdapter.Holder>
      • edu.cnm.deepdive.personalizedsafariapp.view.AccommodationAdapter

  • public class AccommodationAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<edu.cnm.deepdive.personalizedsafariapp.view.AccommodationAdapter.Holder>
    This Adapter class acts as a bridge between the its underlying data and the AccommodationViewModel class and is responsible for making a View for each item in the data set.

      The constructor to initialize objects in the AccommodationAdapter class.
